statements.statement: select distinct A.DICHVU_ID, A.NHOMDICHVU_ID, A.MADICHVU, A.TENDICHVU, B.LOAIDICHVU_ID, C.MALOAIDICHVU, CASE WHEN SUBSTR(B.MANHOMDICHVU,2) = '03' THEN '02' ELSE SUBSTR(B.MANHOMDICHVU,2) END AS MANHOMDICHVU from TM_DICHVU A left join TM_NHOMDICHVU B on B.NHOMDICHVU_ID = A.NHOMDICHVU_ID left join TM_LOAIDICHVU C on B.LOAIDICHVU_ID = C.LOAIDICHVU_ID where A.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
